task-wS3rEMyu.title: GpuBuffer flushing logic should be removed
task-wS3rEMyu.description:
This means removing WriteCached/WriteCachedType/ZeroOutCached/ReadCached/FlushCache from render::GpuBuffer. mCache and mIsCache dirty members should also be removed.

TMaterialParameterAdapter::Update should be updated as it depends on these calls. It should instead use the GpuBufferMappedScope to write to the GpuBuffer memory directly. render::GpuBuffer already has a Map() method that supports this. b3d::GpuBuffer doesn't - one should be added which returns a pointer to the internal CPU cached memory. It's existing WriteCached/WriteCachedType/ZeroOutCached/ReadCached should be renamed to Write/WriteTyped/Read (must share the same names between regular and render proxy of GpuBuffer).

All calls to GpuBuffer::FlushCache can be removed as caching is no longer supported. GpuBufferFlag::AllowWriteCachingOnCPU should be removed. All b3d::GpuBuffer objects will have a CPU cache by default.

task-q4qbu6Od.title: Persistent GPU scene
task-q4qbu6Od.description:
- When doing this I need to go over all GpuBuffer usages:
  - Uniform buffers that are rarely updated need to be device local and updated via staging buffers
  - CPU visible buffers need a ring buffer and dynamic offsets. Currently there's a single instance of that buffer, which ends up creating staging buffers when data is 
    written to the buffer (because it is currently used by the GPU from previous frame)

task-5Mvue2Nl.title: Validation error when rendering shadows
task-5Mvue2Nl.description: Shadows require a pipeline layout with stages Vertex|Fragment|Geometry, but currently the PerObject buffers are allocated only using stages Vertex|Fragment. That layout is still necessary for regular (non-shadow) rendering, so we need a different layout (and parameter set) for shadows. UniformBufferPool should probably be extended so it can return an additional GpuParameterSet for shadows only (likely I need a helper getter + enum, similar to how I have AllocationResult::GetSuballocation getter, but for parameter sets).

promptHistory.content: Created plan v1: Multi-layout parameter set support in UniformBufferPools to fix shadow validation error

task-1xQyWWCo.title: PerCamera buffer need to be re-created every frame
task-1xQyWWCo.description: Right now it's created once, and then updated during its lifetime. But this is incorrect as the buffer will be used on the GPU for the previous frame while we are updating it for the current frame.

promptHistory.content: Created plan v1: Replace persistent PerCamera buffer with transient allocation to fix frame-in-flight race condition. Identified 13+ files needing updates.

Implemented: Used GpuBufferPool for PerCamera buffer allocation instead of persistent SPtr<GpuBuffer>. Updated RendererView (header+cpp), SkyboxMaterial::Bind, and 15+ callers across B3DRenderCompositor, B3DRenderBeast, B3DPostProcessing, B3DStandardDeferred, B3DShadowRendering, and B3DGpuParticleSimulation files to use GpuBufferSuballocation.
